Licenses specified in this page can only be used by XWiki Committers.
= IntelliJ IDEA Open Source License for XWiki =
{{code language="none"}} ========LICENSE DETAILS========
Type: Open Source License Upgrade Reference No*: LC-23790-D367414812 Date of Issue: 26 April 2012 Expiration Date: 25 April 2013 Number of Authorized Users: not limited
* Please quote this reference when contacting JetBrains
===========LICENSEE============
Name: XWiki Customer ID: 23790 Address: unknown city, France
=======SOFTWARE PRODUCT========
Product Name: IntelliJ IDEA Licensed Version: the current version and any new product release which is made generally available before 25 April 2013
The software is shipped electronically and is available for download from: http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/download/
=========INSTALLATION==========
Run IntelliJ IDEA and follow the Installation Wizard's instructions. To register for use of the software or change your existing registration details, go to Help/Register menu of the software and enter the included below the User Name and License Key(s) into the registration dialog:
User Name: XWiki License Key: 23790-F0QZF-FQEDN-FLYYH-8BDYC-YBS71 {{/code}}
